articles.title: China is reportedly buying Tencent shares that give the Communist Party special rights - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: The stakes usually involve a 1% holding and are known as "special management shares," according to the Financial Times.
articles.content:
The Chinese government is buying shares in Alibaba, Tencent and other tech companies to be more deeply involved in their businesses, sources told the Financial Times.

articles.title: Rwanda: Health Official Dispels Myths Around Recent Bout of Flu - AllAfrica - Top Africa News
articles.description: The bout of influenza that affected a lot of people towards the end of 2022 and the New Year has nothing to do with the Covid-19 virus and nor is it in any way related to vaccination.
